_header: He that made with His hand

BodDou236.First Lines:
After his fader deyngSote to say with outen
                    blame…
BodDou236.Last Lines:
…To al þy frendes fer & nerþe to helpen with al
                    her power
BodDou236.Editions:
Kölbing,  Eugen. 
             Arthour and Merlin.
Altenglische Bibliothek
         4. Leipzig: Reisland, 1890: 275-355.

BLAdd27879.Editions:
Hales,  John Wesley,  and  Frederick James Furnivall, eds.  
             Bishop Percy’s Folio Manuscript: Ballads and Romances.
         3 vols. London: Trübner, 1867-68: 1.417.

BLHar6223.First Lines:
He that made with his hondeWynde wode watar and
                    londe…
BLHar6223.Last Lines:
…Bothe by day & also by nyghtFor he thowght hym selffe by
                    treson
BLHar6223.Editions:
Turnbull,  William Barclay David Donald,
                        ed.  
             Arthour and Merlin.
Abbotsford Club
         12. Edinburgh, 1838: x-xiii.

LincInnH150.First Lines:
He þat made wiþ his hondwynd and water wode and
                    lond…
LincInnH150.Last Lines:
…he blesse ows alle wiþ his hondand sende ows pes in
                    Engelond
LincInnH150.Attributed Title:
Incipit the History of Merlin (f. 13, later hand); Explicit
                        Merlin (f. 27v, by scribe)
LincInnH150.Editions:
Kölbing,  Eugen. 
             Arthour and Merlin.
Altenglische Bibliothek
         4. Leipzig: Reisland, 1890: 275-355i.
